node.name: MSQL / MYSQL
node.rich_text:
Usually run on port 1433 MSSQL (Windows) or 2433 for “hidden” 3306or MySql
Authentification Methods: 1. Windows Auth = the user is already authentificated via windows token so it does not need pw and just pass the userr 2. using username / pw provivided in the SQL database.
Windows auth:
